title: No Sound in Game
body:
I recently have been having a problem where I get into the game with no sound and the only way I have been able to fix it is just by DCing and coming back over and over again till it fixes its self. Usually its fixed in one restart it but in the last ranked game I played it took like 4 or 5 restarts. 

it says league is playing through the correct device,I can hear everthing else fine and I even disabled every other audio device on my PC. I have no idea what could be causing it.

replies.body:
You may have background applications interfering with League when it attempts to access your playback device. I'd like you to [**perform a clean boot**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) to ensure no background apps are running so you can hop into a custom match and see if anything's changed.

Let me know what you experienced.
